title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments Snapshot

view.title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments
view.subtitle: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

blocks.title: Customer Advanced Payment Flow completed
blocks.message: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.
Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Vehicle amenity selection (champagne, decorations)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "GPS-based arrival confirmation". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Limo Service (Point-to-Point Transfer). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

requestBody.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Books next appointment while driving (voice?)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).
